title: (x) Changebridge faxed sans - Tahoma {Brandon S}
content:
I appreciate it. Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905132925im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/changebridge_3464.jpg)

 [‹ Geometric sans, similar to VAG Rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905132925/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36738 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Ukrainian" square sans caps - FB Agency Comp {Marc O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905132925/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36748 "Go to next forum topic")
author: stealyourboognish

comments.content: Not Tahoma. Kinda reminds me of Berliner Grotesk, but it’s not that either.
Why not Tahoma? Well, faxed Tahoma …
Well, I guess it could be. The”e”s and “a”s threw me off because they are so plugged up. But now that I look at it with fax eyes, it probably is Tahoma. Sorry if I created any confusion!
